scripts.link-assets-android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/
scripts.clean-cache: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/haste-* && watchman watch-del-all && yarn cache clean
scripts.clean-all: yarn clean-android && yarn clean-node-modules && yarn clean-metro
scripts.clean-android: yarn clean-cache && rm -rf android/build && rm -rf android/app/build && rm -rf android/.gradle && cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd ..
scripts.run-android-es-dev-debug: yarn env-es-dev react-native run-android --variant esDevDebug --appIdSuffix es.dev
scripts.run-android-es-dev-release: yarn regenerate-android-bundle && yarn env-es-dev react-native run-android --variant esDevRelease --appIdSuffix es.dev
scripts.run-android-es-qa-debug: yarn env-es-qa react-native run-android --variant esQaDebug --appIdSuffix es.qa
scripts.run-android-es-qa-release: yarn regenerate-android-bundle && yarn env-es-qa react-native run-android --variant esQaRelease --appIdSuffix es.qa
scripts.make-apk-base: export ENVFILE=src/whiteLabel/es/.env && yarn jetify && cd android && ./gradlew assemblebaseDevRelease && cd ..
scripts.make-aab-base: export ENVFILE=src/whiteLabel/es/.env && yarn jetify && cd android && ./gradlew bundleesDevrelease && cd ..
scripts.make-apk-es-dev: export ENVFILE=src/whiteLabel/es/.env && yarn jetify && cd android && ./gradlew assembleesDevrelease && cd ..
scripts.make-aab-es-dev: export ENVFILE=src/whiteLabel/es/.env && yarn jetify && cd android && ./gradlew bundleesDevrelease && cd ..
